commonSentences.name: IV Placement
commonSentences.text: +The patient had a [+[customDropdown:IV Size:14G,16G,18G,20G,22G,24G] IV placed in the [customDropdown:IV Location:left arm,right arm,left hand,right hand]].

commonSentences.name: Ventilator
commonSentences.text: The patient was on a ventilator [customDropdown:Ventilator Mode:AC,PC,PSV,CPAP] with the following settings: pressure control [text:Pressure], rate [text:Rate], FiO2 [text:FiO2], PEEP [text:PEEP], and tidal volume [text:Tidal Volume].

commonSentences.name: O2 Therapy
commonSentences.text: The patient was on [text:Rate]LPM O2 via [customDropdown:O2 Delivery Device:Nasal Cannula,High Flow Nasal Cannula,Simple Mask,Non-Rebreather Mask,CPAP,Venturi Mask].

commonSentences.name: GCS
commonSentences.text: The patient's GCS was assessed as [text:GCS] ([customDropdown:GCS Eye:4 (Spontaneously),3 (To verbal command),2 (To pain),1 (No eye opening),NT (Not Testable)],[customDropdown:GCS Verbal:5 (Oriented),4 (Confused),3 (Inappropriate words),2 (Incomprehensible sounds),1 (No verbal response),NT (Not Testable)],[customDropdown:GCS Motor:6 (Obeys commands),5 (Localizes pain),4 (Withdraws from pain),3 (Flexion to pain),2 (Extension to pain),1 (No motor response),NT (Not Testable)]).

commonSentences.name: Belongings
commonSentences.text: The patient's belongings, which included: [text:Belongings], were left [customDropdown:Belongings Location:with the patient,with the family,with staff at the receiving facility].

commonSentences.name: Cardiac Monitor
commonSentences.text: The patient was on a cardiac monitor for the duration of transport, with the following findings: [text:Cardiac Monitor Findings].

commonSentences.name: Facility Meds
commonSentences.text: +The patient was transported with the following IV medications from the sending facility: [+\n[text:Facility Medication] at [text:Rate]].

commonSentences.name: Meds Administered
commonSentences.text: +During transport, the patient was administered the following medications: [+\n[text:Dosage] of [customDropdown:Medication] via [text:Route] at [text:Time]] \nby [customDropdown:Provider] due to [text:Reason for Medication]. The patient [customDropdown:Medication Response:responded well,had no response,had an adverse reaction] to the medications.

Assistance Info: EMS Crew x2 and Facility Staff x1
EMS Crew x2 and Facility Staff x2
EMS Crew x2 and Facility Staff x3
EMS Crew x2 and Facility Staff x4
Medical Necessity: 1: Patient was bed confined before and after transport
2: Patient required Cardiac / Hemodynamic monitoring during transport
3: Patient is confused, combative, lethargic, or comatose
5: Patient is a danger to self or others - requires monitoring
6: Patient has DVT required elevation of lower extremity
7: Patient requires IV Medications / Fluids during transport
8: Patient has moderate to severe pain upon movement
9: Patient is morbidly obese and requires additional personnel / equipment
11: Patient requires orthopedic device requiring special handling in transit
12: Patient requires or medical provider anticipates restraints (Physical or Chemical)
13: Patient has a risk of falling off wheelchair or stretcher while in motion
15: Patient requires special handling en route - Isolation
16: Patient requires assistance for administration / regulation of oxygen
17: Patient is unable to maintain seated position for time needed to transport
18: Patient is unable to sit in chair or wheelchair due to decubitus ulcer
19: Patient requires transfer for higher level of care; First hospital lacks equipment / services
